channel.title: Konnect Developer Portal :: API Management with Kong Konnect and Serverless API Gateway
channel.description: Kong Service and Route Create a Kong Service based on http://httpbin.org Create a Kong Route with path “/“ CORS Globally enable the CORS plugin to your Control Plane API Create an API Use httpbin-orig.yaml. Show the two sections: security & securitySchemes Check Spec and send a “try it!” the “Returns Origin IP” Add a documentation Portal Create a portal Check User authn: Konnect built-in RBAC: disabled Default authentication strategy: key-auth Check Settings -> Security tab User authN: on with build-in RBAC: off AuthN strategy: key-auth
